settings.newsletter_text: Indulge your senses and sensibilities. Subscribe for email and SMS alerts for 10% off your order, exclusive deals & more.

settings.title: Dream On
settings.text:
Inspired by: Westin Hotels®


A truly cleansing and revitalizing scent, serene white tea and healing aloe vera combine to create an uplifting aroma with a naturally pleasant undertone. Warm, earthy cedar welcomes your senses as they are greeted by luscious vanilla for a well-rounded aroma.

settings.text: We use cookies on our website to give you the best shopping experience. By using this site, you agree to its use of cookies.

settings.title: How long does an order take to deliver?
settings.answer:
Please allow 5-7 days for processing and 5-8 days for standard delivery. 

Customers outside the US or with non-contiguous US addresses (APO/FPO, Guam, Hawaii) may also take longer to deliver.

settings.title: Can I modify my order after it's been placed?
settings.answer:
Due to our fulfillment and ordering process, we are not able to guarantee any accommodations can be made to an order once placed, including alterations or cancellations.

If you need to update any information on your order, email us at support@hotelcollection.com as soon as possible!

Before you place your order, please confirm that all of your information; including your shipping address, name, phone number, credit card details, and product selection is correct; as Hotel Collection is not responsible for any mistakes. Thank you.

settings.title: How can I check the status of my order?
settings.answer:
Be sure to Create an Account, or login, to easily check the status of your order.

After an order has been completed, you will receive a confirmation email from us as well as updates when your order is processed and shipped.

settings.title: Can I track my package?
settings.answer:
Yes, once your package is shipped, you will receive an email including your tracking number.

Click the hyperlinked tracking number to easily track your package or copy & paste it into any search engine and it will direct you to a tracking page.

Didn't get a tracking number?

Please email us with your order number and someone will get back to you.

settings.title: What is your shipping policy?
settings.answer:
We ship worldwide. Receive free shipping in the U.S on orders over $275. Shipping rates vary per location. We are not able to ship to P.O. Boxes at this time.

The exact shipping options for your country will be presented during checkout.

Read our complete Shipping Policy.

settings.title: What is your return policy?
settings.answer:
Due to the nature of our products, used candles, reed diffusers, fragrance oils, and room sprays cannot be returned or refunded.

If you are not satisfied with your purchase, you can return your item(s) within 30 days of delivery. Sale items are final sale. Only items that have been purchased directly from Hotel Collection can be returned to Hotel Collection.

Read our complete Return Policy.

settings.title: Where does Hotel Collection ship from?
settings.answer:
Hotel Collection is proudly made in the U.S.

All orders are shipped out of our Miami, Florida warehouse and distribution center, using both FedEx and UPS.

settings.title: What do I do if I received the wrong order?
settings.answer: If you believe there was an error in your order, please email us. Be sure to provide us with your product order number and an image of the incorrect product.

settings.title: Wines
settings.answer:
Why did Hotel Collection decide to venture into the wine world?

Great question. We are passionate about providing our customers with the 5-star Hotel experience in their home. Whether it be coming home to a relaxing glass of wine or lighting a candle that smells heavenly, our goal is to bring the elegance of a high-end hotel stay to your home across all lifestyle categories. 

Where is Hotel Collection wine produced?

Our wine is grown, harvested, and bottled by artisan winemakers at one of the region’s oldest wineries and vineyards. The terroir nuances in each bottle are developed across the 4-acre vineyards in the appellations of Navarra and Rioja, Spain. Learn more: How Our Wine Grapes Grow.

What are the Hotel Collection’s criteria for selecting wines?

We sourced the highest quality wine from the region and hand-selected the finest grape varietals for each of our wines. Our team went through blind taste tests and hired a renowned sommelier as our consultant to choose the best Rosé, Chardonnay, and two versions of Red to provide our customers with a curated assortment their house guests will swoon over. After all, nothing pairs better with a candle than a glass of quality wine.

How can I get a monthly Hotel Collection wine subscription?

On each wine product page, simply click the "Subscribe & Save" button to receive 10% off and get your wine delivered to your door monthly.

Is an adult signature required at delivery for wine?

Yes, an in-person signature of someone 21 years of age or older is required upon delivery of any alcohol purchase. A government-issued ID card will be checked at the time of delivery. For this reason, we recommend shipping to a work address or an address where someone will be available to sign. For all alcohol shipments, you will not be able to deliver to a P.O Box if a signature is required.

Will Hotel Collection Wine be available at big name retailers? 

We are always looking to partner with like-minded retailers who share our vision. We will always share our partnership launches across our social media platforms.

Can I return or exchange my wine order?

Customers may not return or exchange any wine product once it has been shipped.

How long does wine last?

Leftover wine? No problem. Make sangria with Hotel Collection. Wine is best served in the first 24 hours of uncorking a bottle. After a couple of days, oxygen interferes with flavor compounds, making wine more acidic (Leave it out long enough and it’ll turn to vinegar). Before that happens, revitalize your leftover wine with our delightful recipes. Discover: Hosting with Hotel Collection.

settings.title: Candles
settings.answer:
Why do I need a wick trimmer?

Wick trimmers are used to create a more even burn in candles. Trim your wick to ¼ inch before use. This helps to control how much wax melts, limits soot, and significantly prolongs the life of the candle. Read more candle tips here.

What are Hotel Collection candles made from? 

Our soy-blend candles are 100% non-toxic and cruelty-free, made with the finest oil concentrations and 100% lead-free cotton wicks.

Where are Hotel Collection candles made?

Our candles are hand-poured with love in our Miami, Florida, U.S warehouse.

How long does each candle last? 

Candle burn time depends on the size of the candle, however, our candles can last anywhere from 85 to 390 hours. To make the most out of each candle we recommend the first lighting of each candle last for the provided times below. 

What is a candle's initial burn time?

The initial burn time is based off the size of the candle vessel. When you first light a brand new candle, it is best to follow proper burning instructions as to optimize the quality and evenness of the burn and lengthen the total burn time. Please follow instructions when you first purchase Hotel Collection candles.

Classic 11oz - 3 hours

Gatsby 14oz - 4 hours 

Deluxe 55oz - 6 hours 

How do I clean up candle wax?

Don't cry over spilled candles! We compiled an easy clean up guide: How to Clean Candle Wax Off Anything. Be sure to follow our usage instructions on each product.

settings.title: Room Sprays
settings.answer:
How do I use a room spray?

Spray 3-5 times in one area. Keep the nozzle approximately 1-2 feet away from the intended surface. If you use too much, ventilate the space with a fan or window to air out the aroma. 

Where do room sprays work best?

Room sprays offer a quick spritz to freshen up linens and fabrics, including but not limited to bedding, closest, rugs, carpets, couches, curtains, and clothes.

How to clean up room spray? 

The bottle is made of thick glass. If broken, properly sweep up any shattered glass. Blot up the liquid using a cloth or paper towel. To remove residue, use rubbing alcohol. For delicate surfaces, like marble and wood, use the proper cleaning supplies to prevent damaging surfaces.

Read more: How to Get Oil Off Clothes & Fabrics

settings.title: I forgot my password, what should I do?
settings.answer:
To reset your password, go to the login page and then click "Forgot Password".

Still having trouble locating your account? Email us.

settings.title: How do I create/manage my subscription?
settings.answer:
Subscribe and Save 10% off monthly deliveries. Free shipping on orders $250+. Get $100 off Diffusers when purchased with any fragrance oil subscription.

Create an Account

Or simply click the "Subscribe & Save" button while adding items to your cart to be automatically subscribed.

Available Subscription Products:
〇 Select Candles
〇 Fragrance Oils
〇 Wines
〇 Reed Diffusers
〇 Room Sprays 

Account Portal Features:
〇 Review purchase history
〇 Manage subscriptions
〇 Swap or add products
〇 Pause deliveries
+++ More features coming soon!

We will also send you email and SMS notifications, where you can easily manage your subscription. Subscriptions are delivered every 30 days. Allow 2 days for processing and 5-7 business days for standard delivery after every billing cycle.

Alterations must be made to your order within 48 hours of your charge date. Having trouble accessing your account? Email us.

settings.title: What forms of payment does Hotel Collection accept?
settings.answer: All transactions are secure and encrypted. We accept payments from ShopPay, AmazonPay, PayPal, GooglePay, Apple Pay, and all Debit/Credit Cards like Visa, Discover, Amex, and Mastercard.

settings.title: Does Hotel Collection offer financing?
settings.answer: Yes, we offer pay-by-installments via ShopPay, which allows for you to pay in full or in 4 interest-free installments for orders between $50-$3,000. Absolutely no hidden fees.

settings.title: Interested in becoming an affiliate with us?
settings.answer:
To apply to our affiliate or influencer program, please email our Influencer and Affiliate Relations Management Team.

To Enter:
- You must have 50k+ followers on at least one of your social media platforms. Please make sure to attach your social media platform(s) in your application.
- At this time, we are only accepting TikTok, Instagram and Youtube influencers in the United States, Canada, the U.K, and Australia.

Multiple submissions will not increase your chance of being contacted. Submissions are reviewed on a weekly basis. Approved applicants will receive a campaign email invitation.

settings.title: Interested in becoming a wholesaler or retailer with us?
settings.answer:
We welcome you to apply to our wholesale program. Prior to applying to our program please note that there is a $1,000 order minimum. Any order below that amount will not qualify for checkout.

If you are interested in purchasing diffusers and oils, the order minimum is $5,000 and requires a Scent Consultant appointment in order to make a purchase.

Please submit a request to speak with a Scent Consultant.

settings.title: I have a general question about my order.
settings.answer: The H.C Customer Concierge is happy to assist you. Please email us and be sure to include your product order number and/or email address used to place the order.

settings.title: How do I create an account?
settings.answer:
Create a Hotel Collection Account to:

- Review purchase history

- Update personal information, including email address, phone number, billing and shipping addresses

- Manage subscriptions: Swap or add products, pause deliveries, and more.

settings.title: Candles
settings.answer:
What is a Hotel Collection Candle's initial burn time?

Classic 11oz - 3 hours

Deluxe 55oz - 6 hours 

When you first light a brand new candle, it is best to follow proper burning instructions as to optimize the quality and evenness of the burn and lengthen the total burn time. Please follow instructions when you first purchase Hotel Collection candles.

How long does each Hotel Collection Candle last? 

Candle burn time depends on the size of the candle.

Classic 11oz - 70 hours

Deluxe 55oz - 300 hours

What are Hotel Collection Candles made from? 

All our candles are curated using a soy-blend wax and are 100% non-toxic, vegan, and cruelty-free. Each candle is hand-poured in our Miami warehouse with the finest oil concentrations and 100% lead-free cotton wicks. Read more.

How do I clean up candle wax?

Don't cry over spilled candles! We compiled an easy clean up guide: How to Clean Candle Wax Off Anything

Why do I need a Wick Trimmer?

Wick trimmers are used to create a more even burn in candles. Trim your wick to ¼ inch before use. This helps to control how much wax melts, limits soot, and significantly prolongs the life of the candle.

Read more about proper candle care here.

settings.title: Diffusers
settings.answer:
Learn more about each Hotel Collection Oil Diffuser: 

- Which Diffuser is Right for Your Home

- Scent Diffusers

- Chauffeur Car Diffuser

- Hourglass Diffusers

- Reed Diffusers

What is Cold Air Diffusion?

The Scent Diffuser, Penthouse Diffuser, Villa Diffuser, and Presidential Diffuser each use cold air diffusion, which ensures consistent and subtle scenting without any highs or lows. This type of advanced atomization technology is residue free and safe for pets, children, artwork and furniture.

Cold air diffusion is the latest technology in the scenting industry. It works by using high amounts of cold filtered air combined with air pressure to diffuse oils into a dry mist of nanoparticles. Using no heat or water, this scenting technique preserves the therapeutic properties of our fragrance oils without altering their smell.

What other features do Hotel Collection Diffusers have?

All Hotel Collection Scent Diffusers offer customizable fragrance intensity and automatically turn off when the timer is up or oil runs out.

Our larger models, the Penthouse Diffuser, Villa Diffuser, and Presidential Diffuser boast a built-in fan for consistent coverage, security lock for the fragrance compartment, and programmable weekly timer that allows up to four unique operating periods. They can be wall-mounted or used as stand-alone diffusers.

What is HVAC Scenting?

Both the Villa Diffuser and Presidential Diffuser can be connected to Heating, Ventilation, and Air Conditioning (HVAC) system in your home or business.

The HVAC system controls the humidity, temperature, and purity of the air.

Connecting a diffuser to the HVAC system ensures a consistent and even distribution of scent throughout your space.

Without the use of heat or water, our cold-air diffusion technology releases a dry fragrance mist into the HVAC ducts.

Learn more about HVAC-Scenting

How do I set up my diffuser?

This ultra-quiet approach to scenting is easy to use, with little maintenance, making it the perfection option for your home or business.

You can find instructional videos for each Scent Diffuser on our Youtube account:

- Scent Diffuser

- Penthouse Diffuser

- Villa Diffuser

Please view our complete instructions for each Scent Diffuser below:

- Hourglass Diffuser

- Scent Diffuser

- Penthouse Diffuser

- Villa Diffuser

- Chauffeur Car Diffuser

settings.title: Fragrance Oils
settings.answer:
What is a Hotel Collection Fragrance Oil?

Our signature Fragrance Oils are derived from the highest quality ingredients in the world. They are a blend of therapeutic-grade essential oils and perfume-quality fragrance oils, designed to mimic the notes of your favorite hotel scents. 

Are Hotel Collection Fragrance Oils safe?

Yes! Our oils are safe to use around people, pets, plants , and furniture.

100% Free of all Parabens, Formaldehyde, Color Additives, Synthetic Dyes, and Preservatives.

Are Hotel Collection Oils cruelty-free?

Yes, we are 100% Animal/Cruelty Free. We do not, and will never, test on animals.

Are Hotel Collection Oils vegan?

Yes! Our formulas are not only Vegan, but derived from Plant-based Ingredients and Sustainably Sourced Essential Oils.

What about sensitivities to fragrances?

Our formulas are 100% Non-Toxic and Hypoallergenic. Hotel Collections oils are IFRA compliant meaning they are of the highest standards in the industry.

How long will the oils last?

When used at the recommended settings of 4-8 hours/day an oil bottle will last approximately one month in a Hotel Collection Diffuser. The exact length of time will depend on the usage and fragrance concentration.

50mL | Scent Diffuser

120mL | Penthouse Diffuser

500mL | Villa Diffuser

Where should I store oils?

Never store oils in direct sunlight. Heat and light can deteriorate their quality and cause oil to evaporate. We encourage you to properly store oils in a dry, cool place.

These oils smell so great; can I use them on my skin?

Since our oils contain pure essential oils and plant essences, do not apply these oils topically as they are in pure, undiluted form. If you get oil on your hands, wash the area with soap and water.

Do Hotel Collection Fragrance Oils have health benefits?

Our formulas maintain all the therapeutic benefits of essential oils and provide maximum versatility and control of the scenting environment.

Our oils are made from the finest plant-derived essences and pure essential oils and have anti-bacterial, antiviral, and antifungal properties.

Some fragrances can be aromatherapeutic and have both physical and mental health benefits, which you can read more about here.

I spilled oil, how do I clean it?

If oil is spilled, thoroughly clean the area (including the unit) with rubbing alcohol. Please remember that these are undiluted essential oils and should therefore be treated with care.

How to Get Oil Off Clothes & Fabrics

settings.title: Reed Diffusers
settings.answer:
How long do Reed Diffusers last?

Reed Diffusers last approximately 3-4 months.

100mL | Reed Diffusers

Where should I place Reed Diffusers?

Never display Reed Diffusers in direct sunlight. Heat and light can deteriorate their quality and cause oil to evaporate, causing you to run out of your favorite fragrance quicker.

Be sure to keep your Reed Diffuser out of reach of children or pets, and place it on a coaster or tray to catch any oil drips, preventing it from staining counters or other delicate surfaces.

How do I set up my Hotel Collection Reed Diffuser?

When first using your Reed Diffuser, dip the reed sticks in to absorb the oil. Then flip them over so that the saturated ends are in the air, allowing for the fragrance to start filtering.

Flip your reeds when you desire more scent. Be cautious when flipping them, doing it over a paper towel to save your surfaces from drips.

How do Reed Diffusers scent a space?

Reed Diffusers disperse scent as fragrance oil is absorbed by the reeds, moving to the top where it is evaporated into the air. When placed in high traffic areas, the scent is able to circulate around a space.

Avoid placing it drafty areas; like near vents, fans, windows, doors that lead to outside, radiators, and air conditioning units; to prevent the oil from dissipating quickly.

settings.title: Room Sprays
settings.answer:
How do I use a Room Spray?

Spray 3-5 times in one area. Keep the nozzle approximately 1-2 feet away from the intended surface. If you use too much, ventilate the space with a fan or window to air out the aroma. 

Where do Room Sprays work best?

Room Sprays offer a quick spritz to freshen up linens and fabrics, including but not limited to bedding, closest, rugs, carpets, couches, curtains, and clothes.

How to clean up Room Spray? 

The bottle is made of thick glass. If broken, properly sweep up any shattered glass. Blot up the liquid using a cloth or paper towel. To remove residue, use rubbing alcohol. For delicate surfaces, like marble and wood, use the proper cleaning supplies to prevent damaging surfaces.

How to Get Oil Off Clothes & Fabrics

settings.title: Wines
settings.answer:
Why did Hotel Collection decide to venture into the wine world?

We are passionate about providing our customers with the 5-star hotel experience in their home. Whether it be coming home to a relaxing glass of wine or lighting a candle that smells heavenly, our goal is to bring the elegance of a high-end hotel stay to your home across all lifestyle categories. 

Where is Hotel Collection Wine produced?

Our Wine Collection is grown, harvested, and bottled by artisan winemakers at one of the region’s oldest wineries and vineyards. The terroir nuances in each bottle are developed across the 4-acre vineyards in the appellations of Navarra and Rioja, Spain. 

What Wines does Hotel Collection have?

We recently released four varietals to choose from.

- Chardonnay 10

- Red Blend 19

- Reserva 56

- Rosé 29

What are the Hotel Collection’s criteria for selecting wines?

We sourced the highest quality wine from the region and hand-selected the finest grape varietals for each of our wines.

Our team went through blind taste tests and hired a renowned sommelier as our consultant to choose the best Rosé, Chardonnay, and two versions of Red to provide our customers with a curated assortment their house guests will swoon over. After all, nothing pairs better with a candle than a glass of quality wine.

Learn more: How Our Wine Grapes Grow

How can I get a monthly Hotel Collection wine subscription?

On each wine product page, simply click the "Subscribe & Save" button to receive 10% off and get wine delivered to your door monthly.

Is an adult signature required at delivery for wine?

A government-issued ID card will be checked and scanned at the time of delivery. An adult 21 years of age or older is required to be present with their ID upon delivery of any alcohol purchase. For this reason, we recommend shipping to a work address or an address where someone will be available to sign.

Will Hotel Collection Wines be available at big name retailers? 

We are always looking to partner with like-minded retailers who share our vision. We will always share our partnership launches across our social media platforms.

Can I return or exchange my wine order?
All Hotel Collection wines are final sale only. Customers may not return or exchange any wine product once it has been shipped.

settings.title: What is the Concierge Club?
settings.answer:
The Concierge Club is Hotel Collection’s loyalty program.

Once you join the club, you'll earn points on qualifying purchases and other interactions with us. You can use these points to redeem for money off at checkout and other exclusive rewards. The more points you have, the higher your loyalty tier and the more benefits you will earn!

Learn more

Concierge Club Terms

We are 24/7 available for you!

settings.title: Our ultimate goal is to ensure that each and every one of our valued customers has a positive and fulfilling shopping experience.
settings.text: We place great emphasis on customer satisfaction. Our ultimate goal is to ensure that each and every one of our valued customers has a positive and fulfilling shopping experience. Whether you have a question, need assistance with an order, or simply want to share your thoughts, we encourage you to get in touch with us. Our dedicated and friendly customer support team is here to listen, address your queries, and provide prompt solutions. Your satisfaction is our topmost priority, and we are committed to resolving any issues you may encounter.

settings.title: Heading text here
settings.text: Use this text to share information about your brand with your customers. Describe a product, share announcements, or welcome customers to your store.

settings.title: Rich text
settings.text:
Use this section to create some callout text on your page, or add more details about your shop, services, promotions, etc. If you have a large amount of text, you can opt to have it display in two columns instead so that it's much easier to read.

This section also includes the option to add a button in primary or secondary style, and also control the colors, including the option for a gradient background. Since this is rich text, you can also format it as you wish and include links.

settings.title: Heading
settings.text: Text area can be used for details about blog authors or general information.

settings.title: Sweetest Taboo
settings.text:
Inspired by: The Aria Hotel®, Las Vegas

Revive your tired senses with a burst of zesty smooth lemon crème, a splash of red pomegranates, and tart raspberries ripe and ready to scent. Fruity fusions are then paired with white woods and peony petals for a balanced aroma to complement any space.

settings.title: Classic Candles
settings.text:

settings.text:

Candle Size: 14 oz | Burn Time: 90 hours | Dimensions: 3.5 in x 4 in

settings.title: My Way
settings.text:
Inspired by: The 1 Hotel®, Miami Beach

Lush sandalwood, warm Virginia Cedar, and beautiful iris scents this aroma has every one of your angles covered. From fine violet to smooth Tuscan leather and sensual amber, find every piece of yourself in this scent. Indulge your senses with our most luxurious scent.

settings.title: Black Velvet
settings.text:
Inspired by: The Edition Hotel

Enter the ravishing world of a hidden speakeasy and indulge in the bold aromas of bergamot, rose, cedar wood, and blonde woods. A twist of zesty lemon, encapsulating amber, and subtle musk unravel this sultry scent leaving you to wonder what mysteries lie ahead.

settings.title: The Sweetest Taboo
settings.text:
Inspired by: The Aria Hotel, Las Vegas

Revive your tired senses with a burst of zesty smooth lemon crème, a splash of red pomegranates, and tart raspberries ripe and ready to scent. Fruity fusions are then paired with white woods and peony petals for a balanced aroma to complement any space.

settings.title: 24K Magic
settings.text:
Inspired by: The W Hotel

This fragrance has a citrus beginning of bergamot, lemon and lemongrass. The fragrance develops into a floral bouquet of magnolia, jasmine and lily. These notes rest on a long-lasting base of koa wood and white musk.

settings.title: My Way
settings.text:

Lush sandalwood, warm Virginia Cedar, and beautiful iris scents this aroma has every one of your angles covered. From fine violet to smooth Tuscan leather and sensual amber, find every piece of yourself in this scent. Indulge your senses with our most luxurious scent.

settings.title: Dream On
settings.text:
Inspired by: Westin Hotels®

A truly cleansing and revitalizing scent, serene white tea and healing aloe vera combine to create an uplifting aroma with a naturally pleasant undertone. Warm, earthy cedar welcomes your senses as they are greeted by luscious vanilla for a well-rounded aroma.

settings.title: 24K Magic
settings.text:
Inspired by: W Hotels®

This fragrance has a citrus beginning of bergamot, lemon and lemongrass. The fragrance develops into a floral bouquet of magnolia, jasmine and lily. These notes rest on a long-lasting base of koa wood and white musk.

settings.title: Sweetest Taboo
settings.text:
Inspired by: The Aria Hotel®, Las Vegas

Revive your tired senses with a burst of zesty smooth lemon crème, a splash of red pomegranates, and tart raspberries ripe and ready to scent. Fruity fusions are then paired with white woods and peony petals for a balanced aroma to complement any space.

settings.title: Midnight in Paris
settings.text:
Inspired by: Hotel Costes®, Paris

Sultry sensations arouse your senses with an aroma that transports you to a romantic scene in a boutique Parisian hotel. A bold, woody accord, tantalizing nutmeg, and passion-filled rose become one while sandalwood and patchouli compliment gentle layers of vanilla and amber.

settings.title: Mystify
settings.text:
Inspired by: The Wynn®, Las Vegas

This fragrance is a fruity floral fragrance with a green character. Mystify begins with a citrus lemon note which is combined with a green melon accord. The body of the fragrance is a floral bouquet of lily and jasmine. This leads to a delicate raspberry nuance. The fragrance dries down to a mossy musk base.

settings.title: California Love
settings.text:
Inspired by: Delano Beach Club®

Escape to the vibrant, energizing outdoors with the scent of crisp, clean lemongrass and refreshingly smooth green tea. Bask in the glow of soft jasmine and serene lily accords as they wrap you in sweet surrender and blissful disengage of the world around you.

settings.title: Desert Rose
settings.text:
Inspired by: Fairmont Hotels®

Capture your love with the deep romance of dark damask rose and the rich layers of oud wood. Enticing clove and sweet praline seduce your senses to create a decadent display of lush aromas for a tantalizing sensory experience unlike any other.

settings.title: November Rain
settings.text:
Inspired by: Marriott Hotels®

This uplifting scent begins with a citrus blend of orange and grapefruit. The main theme is red currant with nuances of jasmine, rose and Cedarwood. The fragrance dries down to a white musk base.

settings.title: My Way
settings.text:
Inspired by: The 1 Hotel, Miami Beach

Lush sandalwood, warm Virginia Cedar, and beautiful iris scents this aroma has every one of your angles covered. From fine violet to smooth Tuscan leather and sensual amber, find every piece of yourself in this scent. Indulge your senses with our most luxurious scent.

settings.title: 24K Magic
settings.text:
Inspired by: The W Hotel

This fragrance has a citrus beginning of bergamot, lemon and lemongrass. The fragrance develops into a floral bouquet of magnolia, jasmine and lily. These notes rest on a long-lasting base of koa wood and white musk.

settings.title: Dream On
settings.text:
Inspired by: The Westin Hotel

A truly cleansing and revitalizing scent, serene white tea and healing aloe vera combine to create an uplifting aroma with a naturally pleasant undertone. Warm, earthy cedar welcomes your senses as they are greeted by luscious vanilla for a well-rounded aroma.

settings.title: <font size="75">Collection of Wines</font>
settings.subtitle: Beautifully-crafted wines that deliver decadence in every glass.

settings.title:
Taste the rolling valleys of Rioja and Navarra, Spain
with the appellation's tradition of winemaking.
settings.text:
Each bottle is perfectly culminated across family-owned vineyards
using a different combination of climate, soil and fruit.

settings.title: Family of Wines
settings.subtitle: s Beautifully crafted Spanish wines that deliver decadence in every glass.

settings.title: Reserva 56
settings.text:
Rich | Full-Bodied | Smoked

Explore the depths of this exquisite red with notes of ripe red fruit, coffee, toffee, chocolate, and spices.

settings.title: Rosé 29
settings.text:
Crisp | Bright | Light

Floral nuances are refreshed with the ripeness of peaches and undertones of sanguine orange.

settings.title: Red Blend 19
settings.text:
Smooth | Rounded | Dry

Our elegant blend is smooth and full of nuances, with notes of dark berries, cherries, chocolate, and spices.

settings.title: Chardonnay 10
settings.text:
Fresh | Delicate | Elegant

Delight in this fresh, silky wine with notes of melon and mango blended with nectarine and apricot flavors.

settings.title: Extraordinary Things Take Time
settings.text:
Born and perfected in the wind-swept valleys of Rioja, Hotel Collection Wines are meticulously crafted to honor centuries of Spanish winemaking.
Imbued in every bottle is a journey; a story meant to be tasted, savored, and felt.

settings.title: Wine Sets
settings.text:
These sets have us on Cloud Wine.

Stamp your passport and set off with the full-of-life flavors of Spain. Each bottle is perfectly curated using a different combination of climate, soil, and fruit to create subtle terroir nuances.

settings.title: Wine Accessories
settings.text: Un-wine with ease with these must-have accessories. Complete any day with Hotel Collection & make relaxation your nightly routine.

settings.title: Growing Conditions
settings.text:
Harvested on dewy early mornings through the months of September and October, using the Navarra traditional technique of “Sangrado,” meaning to have a short maceration time of 1-2 hours. The grapes come from the vineyards of Navarra “Baja Montaña,” across the villages of Alibar and San Martín de Unx. Different plots of the Garnacha variety grow in a mixed soil of sand and limestone soil as well as marl and pebbles to produce a unique flavor.

Altitude
Between 1,312 and 1,640 ft.

settings.title: Terroir
settings.text: Harvested on dewy early mornings through the months of September and October, using the Navarra traditional technique of “Sangrado,” meaning to have a short maceration time of 1-2 hours. The grapes come from the vineyards of Navarra “Baja Montaña,” across the villages of Alibar and San Martín de Unx. Different plots of the Garnacha variety grow in a mixed soil of sand and limestone soil as well as marl and pebbles to produce a unique flavor.

settings.title: Heading text here
settings.text: Use this text to share information about your brand with your customers. Describe a product, share announcements, or welcome customers to your store.

settings.title: Growing Conditions
settings.text:
Harvested on dewy early mornings through the months of September and October, to preserve the aromas and keep the grapes in perfect condition. The Grenache comes from vineyards planted on calcareous clay soil, arranged on slopes in the appellation Navarra. The Tempranillo that complements the reserve is planted at an average altitude and gives structure to the wine. Concurrently, it includes a Cabernet from the Estella area that provides the necessary body to make it a wine to keep.

Altitude
Between 1,640 and 1,969 ft.

settings.title: Catchy heading
settings.text:
Use this section to create some callout text on your page, or add more details about your shop, services, promotions, etc.
You can keep the background color solid or use a background image instead.

settings.title: Heading text here
settings.text: Use this text to share information about your brand with your customers. Describe a product, share announcements, or welcome customers to your store.

settings.title: Growing Conditions
settings.text:
Harvested on dewy early mornings through the months of September and October, to preserve the aromas and keep the grapes in perfect condition. The Tempranillo is aged for 4 months in a 100% American oak barrel to give it the desired structure and strength. After clarifying, it’s bottled.

The grapes come from different areas of the appellation Navarra, with varying altitudes. The care we take for them allows us to guarantee the consistency of style and quality year after year. The Tempranillo that complements this is planted at an average altitude and gives structure to the wine, looking to continue with the faithful portrait of the region and its identity.

Altitude
Between 1312 and 1640 ft.

settings.title: Catchy heading
settings.text:
Use this section to create some callout text on your page, or add more details about your shop, services, promotions, etc.
You can keep the background color solid or use a background image instead.

settings.title: Heading text here
settings.text: Use this text to share information about your brand with your customers. Describe a product, share announcements, or welcome customers to your store.

settings.title: Growing Conditions
settings.text:
To preserve the aromas and keep the grapes in perfect condition, they are harvested on dewy early mornings through the months of September and October. The proximity of the vineyards to the winery guarantees optimal freshness. The two grape varieties are combined in concrete tanks, clarified and kept in the bottle. The grapes come from the vineyards of the Cárcar area in the Navarra appellation.

The Chardonnay variety is specially adapted to our terroir where it reaches maturity and an optimal balance. These are vineyards of poor, sandy and deep soil with good structure and very good drainage, forcing the vine to root deeply, looking in the subsoil for those nutrients and water that it needs.

Altitude
Between 1312 and 1640 ft.

settings.title: What is The Concierge Club?
settings.answer: The Concierge Club is Hotel Collection’s loyalty program. Once you join the club, you'll earn points on qualifying purchases and other interactions with us. You can use these points to redeem for money off at checkout and other exclusive rewards. The more points you have, the higher your loyalty tier and the more benefits you will earn!

settings.title: How do I join The Concierge Club?
settings.answer: You can join the club by creating an account.

settings.title: How do I earn points?
settings.answer: We've listed all your points-earning possibilities here.

settings.title: How do the Loyalty Tiers work?
settings.answer:
Our Concierge Club has three Loyalty Tiers: V.I.P, Platinum, and Black Card that are based on your annual spend on HotelCollection.com.

Our V.I.P tier is free to join by creating  an account. Once you create your account, you will receive a welcome email and begin earning 5 points for every $1 spent.

Once you’ve spent $500 in a 365-day period, you will automatically be upgraded to the Platinum Tier and begin earning 7 points for every $1 spent.

Once you’ve spent $1,000 in a 365-day period, you will automatically be upgraded to the Black Card Tier and begin earning 10 points for every $1 spent. In order to remain in your tier, you must maintain that level of annual spend.

settings.title: How can I view my current Concierge Club status?
settings.answer: Your point balance and current tier level can be viewed in your Concierge Club Account Portal.

settings.title: What can my points be redeemed for?
settings.answer:
Points can be redeemed for Rewards in your Account Portal or at checkout for money off (100 points = $1 off your purchase).

Please note: The Free Shipping Reward has a max shipping rate of $20 and is currently eligible for U.S customers only.

settings.title: How do I redeem rewards?
settings.answer: To redeem rewards, make sure you're logged in to your account. You can redeem rewards in your Account Portal and at Checkout.

settings.title: What do ‘Pending’ points mean?
settings.answer:
Points from a purchase will show as 'Pending' for 30 days after you place your order. After those 30 days, if you have not canceled or altered your order, point status will change from 'Pending' to 'Approved'.

- If an order is canceled or altered, your points will show as ‘Pending’ until your new order status is processed.

- For an altered order, the amount of points you receive on that order will be adjusted in your Account History to reflect your new order status.

settings.title: What do ‘Canceled’ points mean?
settings.answer: If you ever choose to return a product, cancel an order, or unsubscribe from email and/or SMS notifications, your earned points associated with those actions will be deducted from your account and be shown as 'Canceled'.

settings.title: Does my tier membership expire?
settings.answer:
Your tier membership begins when you start shopping with us! Your tier status is based on your total spending activity within 365 days of entering the tier.

In this context, if you begin as a V.I.P member and reach the spending minimum to get upgraded to Platinum, the date of that purchase becomes your new Tier Status Expiration Date.

Afterward, you must maintain the requirements needed for your new tier status or will be downgraded after 365 days to the status associated with your spending activity.

We will remind you one month before your tier membership is about to expire.

settings.title: Do my points expire?
settings.answer: Your points expire 365 days after your last purchase. You must make at least one purchase in this time frame in order for your points to remain active.

settings.title: How can I get early access to sales & new products?
settings.answer: As a member of The Concierge Club you’ll be notified through email and SMS with early access to product releases and sales.

settings.title: Is there a limit to how many points I can earn?
settings.answer: No, there is no limit. However, you may only redeem one reward per purchase.

settings.title: I’m having trouble accessing my account/viewing my points.
settings.answer: For questions or support, please contact us.
